page.title: 03CLUBS II
page.content: {Holywood Sewing Group}meets twice a month during the winter. {Holywood {Church Womans Guild}meets monthly during the winter as do the 60 members of{Holywood SWRI.}THE {Lower {Nithsdale Young Farmers Club}attend- ed by some ofthe young people in the area,holds its annual concert and some other events in the Church Hall. The{Youth Club}hold their meetings in their own hall twice weekly. {Holywood Curling Club}play at Lockerbie Ice Rink or when weather permits at the pond near the station. {COMMUNICATIONS}- Most homes have a telephone. Public kiosks are located at Newbridge and Holywood scheme. Postal deliveries are made 6 days a week. Mail collection points are at East Cluden, Newbridge and Holywood.
